description:
Motoki Sae is http://anidb.net/ch2374 [Misao]`s teacher. She is also a school classmate and astronomy clubmate of http://anidb.net/ch2311 [Akira]`s. She has a powerful punch, which she has used in the past to save Akira from bullies at an arcade.
At school, she tends to behave a little weird, as she is young and inexperienced. She is trying hard to get http://anidb.net/ch20269 [Kawahara Jou] and Misao together as a couple.
In her personal life, her parents are trying to get her married, forcing her to attend an omiai (marriage interview) against her will.
name: Motoki Sae
